title: How to Check a Download for Viruses

steps.title: Click on the "Submit a URL" tab and enter the address of the website where you are about to download the file from.
steps.content: Click on the "Submit a URL" tab and enter the address of the website where you are about to download the file from.

steps.title: Hit the "Submit URL" button.
steps.content: Hit the "Submit URL" button. Virus Scan will check the website for viruses and let you know whether it is safe for downloading files from there or not.

steps.title: Go to the Virus Total website.
steps.content: Go to the Virus Total website.

steps.title: Press the Browse button in the "Upload a file" tab.
steps.content: Press the Browse button in the "Upload a file" tab.

steps.title: Browse to the file that you have downloaded and select it.
steps.content: Browse to the file that you have downloaded and select it.

steps.title: Press the "Send file" button.
steps.content: Press the "Send file" button. Virus Total will check the download for viruses and let you know of any threats that were detected.

steps.title: Open the Jotti website on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Jotti website on your computer.

steps.title: Use the Browse button to select the download that you want to scan for viruses.
steps.content: Use the Browse button to select the download that you want to scan for viruses.

steps.title: Hit the "Submit file" link.
steps.content: Hit the "Submit file" link. Jotti will scan the file and display a status message to let you know if any viruses were detected.

steps.title: Depending on what program you have, perform a Custom Scan.
steps.content: Depending on what program you have, perform a Custom Scan.

steps.title: Select the downloaded file as the file to be scanned.
steps.content: Select the downloaded file as the file to be scanned.
